704422f-a.title: Brooklyn: Fort Hamilton - 59th Street
704422f-a.text:
Fort Greene Place, east side (extreme right), south
from Fulton Street, showing debris after a row of build-
ings both on Fort Green Place and Fulton Street were razed
and the area later cleared for a used car sales lot. In
the background is the rear of the Y.M.C.A. Building which
fronts on Hanson Place.
July 5, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
South on the east side of Fort Greene Place from
Fulton Street, ten years later. Note the used car sales
lot.
July 5, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODCTINS
